text:
Hospitality workers are the lifeblood of Las Vegas.

That's why I'm back home standing with the Culinary Union as they push for better pay and safer working conditions.

Workers deserve a fair agreement.

Today, I spoke with Rosalinda & Amber, who my office recently helped.

I was thrilled to hear Rosalinda is buying a home after receiving her disability back pay.

I shared my condolences & relief with Amber after her son’s SSN issues were resolved so he could receive needed care.
#TeamHorsford had a great time celebrating with everyone at the Historical Westside School Centennial Celebration Parade!

Great news! The @USDOTFHWA announced investments of over $550M for Nevada!

Our communities will receive $500M for highways, $45M for bridges, and $8M for electric vehicle infrastructure, thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law that I voted for.

While some of my extremist MAGA colleagues are busy creating chaos in DC over their jobs, I'm in Las Vegas standing with the nearly 53k Culinary & Bartenders Union workers who are fighting for their jobs & negotiations for better wages, good benefits, & safer working conditions.

Today, I voted to remove the Speaker amid extremist MAGA Republican chaos.

We must move beyond divisive politics and work toward solutions that benefit Nevadans & all Americans.

If Republicans aren’t ready to lead, they should step aside & let Democrats put #PeopleOverPolitics.

Meanwhile, on the @SenateFloor history was made and Senator Laphonza Butler was sworn in.

And immediately after, I was proud to swear her in as the 59th member of  @TheBlackCaucus

#MentalIllnessAwarenessWeek is a reminder to prioritize our mental well-being and check in with those around us.

Recognize the warning signs, and don’t hesitate to seek help or offer support. Your mental health is important.

Learn more nami.org/About-Mental-Illnes…

On this International Day of Non-Violence, let’s strive to foster a global culture of peace, tolerance, and understanding.

In these challenging times, may we be inspired to resolve conflicts through dialogue and mutual respect.

Congratulations to Laphonza Butler on her appointment to serve as Senator for California!

I’m excited to welcome you into the CBC, hear your perspectives on the women’s & LGBTQ+ rights under siege, and work together to stand up for women, girls, students, union workers, & more.

The survivors of the 1 October shooting and their loved ones are still grappling with its impact on their lives.

We will never forget this tragic event, the largest mass shooting in U.S. history.

I cast my vote to avert an extreme MAGA Republican shutdown, safeguarding federal workers, servicemembers, & their families.

I’ll continue bipartisan efforts to fully fund the government while resisting extreme proposals that threaten rights and education.

An extreme MAGA Republican shutdown will put countless working families in jeopardy in Nevada and across the country.

We need responsible leadership that will stop these damaging political games.

After 148 days of standing strong, TV & movie writers are returning to work, marking a triumph for labor rights.

This shows the power of collective voice and the need for fair treatment of employees.

I’ll continue to champion the rights of workers in every industry.

ATTENTION POST-9/11 COMBAT VETERANS: If you were discharged 10+ years ago, the deadline for a special one-year VA health care enrollment is Sept. 30th.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure the care you deserve. Enroll now at VA.gov/PACT

Today is #NationalVoterRegistrationDay!

Every voice in Nevada deserves to be heard, and every vote counts.

If you or a loved one haven't registered yet, take a moment today and make sure you're ready to make your voice heard.

Congratulations to everyone at the West Las Vegas Library for hosting a successful trades fair!

The fair connected our local youth and young adults with various trade opportunities across our valley.

It's #PassportAwarenessMonth!

Before planning your 2024 travels, check your passport’s expiration date.

Many countries require at least 6 months of validity before entry.

Be prepared: Get your passport renewed before booking!

I’m sad to learn of the passing of Tom Conway, International President of @steelworkers.

Tom worked for working people, and his efforts helped generations of workers.

My thoughts are with his family and the entire USW community.

As we celebrate #HispanicHeritageMonth, I'm proud to recognize @SenCortezMasto, the first and only Latina in the U.S Senate and a fellow UNR alum.

I'm always inspired to see fellow Nevadans breaking barriers and representing our diverse heritage.

Everyone deserves the right to make decisions about their own body.

Reproductive freedom is a fundamental right.

I'll always stand firm in defending and championing that right.

Today, on Gold Star Mothers and Families Day, I’m pausing to honor the immense sacrifices made by families who’ve lost a loved one in service to our nation.

Their strength and resilience embody the spirit of Nevada and our entire country.

We stand with you, today and always.

To everyone in #NV04 and throughout our nation observing Yom Kippur, may your fast be blessed and your reflections meaningful.

G’mar Chatima Tovah.

The #ClimateCrisis is not a distant threat. It already impacts many underserved communities.

We must recognize the deep connections between climate change, equity, and public health.

Let’s champion sustainable, equitable solutions to ensure a brighter future for all Nevadans.

Did you know that it’s National Sickle Cell Awareness Month?

I stand in solidarity with those battling this condition and their families.

Let’s raise awareness, advocate for better treatments, and support our fellow Nevadans living with sickle cell.

Great news for Mt. Charleston! Following my visit with local officials to see the storm damage, I'm pleased to announce an emergency grant of $500k from the Federal Highway Administration to repair the roads damaged by Tropical Storm Hillary.

ATTENTION POST-9/11 COMBAT VETERANS: If you were discharged 10+ years ago, the deadline for a special one-year VA health care enrollment is Sept. 30th.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure the care you deserve. Enroll now at VA.gov/PACT

I'm celebrating #HispanicHeritageMonth by spotlighting Chicanos Por La Causa Nevada.

Their efforts provide invaluable support to local businesses, foster economic growth & empower our Hispanic communities to thrive even in challenging times.

Team Horsford attended the 2023 Henderson Chamber of Commerce "Ready, Set, Expo".

Great work by @HCC_Nevada & the small business owners!

We met with small business owners sharing their products & services, entrepreneurs, industry professionals, & community stakeholders.

I'm working to lower health care costs for Nevada's families.

That's why I've voted for the provisions to expand savings through the ACA, which are saving single-parent, single-child families in #NV04 an average of $1200 on their health insurance.

Thanks to everyone who attended the 2023 Las Vegas Air Force Ball to mark 76 years of Air Force innovation. 

It was great to join with so many people from across Nevada to commemorate Nevada's Air Force heritage.

I was honored to join in the celebrations for Mexican Independence Day.

Thanks to Councilwoman Olivia Diaz and the Mexican Consul General for putting on a great event.

Congrats to Forgotten Not Gone on their new location's grand opening!

With a $1.6M investment, they'll help our veterans stay active through adaptive biking.

I'm proud to have voted for the provisions that helped make this possible.

Congratulations to all LIMA Diversionary Program Graduates.

I wish you all the best as you continue your recovery journey.

It's great to see the progress being made at the new Mario's Westside Market!

Thanks to everyone involved for their efforts to reduce food insecurity and provide fresh fruits and vegetables in our communities.

Happy #HispanicHeritageMonth!

I was thrilled to kick off the celebrations with the City of North Las Vegas.

Thanks to everyone who joined in celebrating the rich diversity of #NV04.

During #RecoveryMonth, we stand together to work for better mental health and wellness.

Remember that no matter the challenge, #RecoveryIsPossible.

Over 59 million Americans are proof that #RecoveryIsReal.

Learn, support, and spread hope at FindSupport.gov

Shanah Tovah to everyone in Nevada and around the globe observing Rosh Hashanah.

As we usher in the Jewish New Year, may it be filled with peace, health, and abundant happiness.

Today, on National POW/MIA Recognition Day, we honor and remember the brave servicemembers from Nevada and across our country who were prisoners of war or remain missing in action.

Their sacrifices and the pain endured by their loved ones will never be forgotten.

This #HispanicHeritageMonth, we celebrate the rich history, culture, and contributions of the Latino community in #NV04 and across Nevada.

Their impacts have made our country better, stronger, and more diverse.

Let's honor and recognize their influence today and every day.

September is #OvarianCancerAwarenessMonth.

I stand with the brave women battling this disease and their loved ones.

Let's amplify awareness, support early detection, and champion research for a cure.

During #HungerActionMonth, I'm recommitting to work to ensure every Nevadan has access to nutritious food.

Let's unite in our efforts to combat hunger and support our local food banks this month and always.
#TeamHorsford had a great time joining the thousands of guests attending the festival to bring communities together to celebrate diversity at the Communities United Multicultural Festival.

I'm deeply disappointed by the recent #DACA decision in Texas.

While current Dreamers in Nevada & beyond can continue contributing to our communities, it's outrageous that future young immigrants may not have the same opportunities.

They deserve better. We need real reform.

Ethan Song was only 15 when he was tragically killed by an unsecured gun.

Today, I signed the discharge petition for Ethan's Law, aiming to set federal standards for gun safety.

No child should be at risk from unsecured guns.

I'm joining my colleagues & celebrating #50YearsOfHipHop.

We're honoring a genre that's empowered the Black community for decades.

Hip-Hop has given voice to the voiceless & has paved the way for justice.

Let's uplift its legacy and ensure it thrives for generations to come.

I had the privilege to join the community meeting hosted by @LVMPDBAC.

I shared my personal connection to gun violence & engaged in meaningful discussions with faith leaders, community stakeholders, & our dedicated law enforcement.

Together, we're striving for a safer Nevada.

Without the expanded #ChildTaxCredit:

❌Child poverty more than doubled from 2021 to 2022
❌Raised taxes for families of over 60 million kids.
❌Helped push 5 million American kids into poverty
 
This is outrageous.

I joined @NevadaHANDLV's Senior Wellness Festival & shared my work to advocate for #NV04 seniors.

I've voted for provisions capping Rx drug costs at $2k/year for Medicare & supported the Social Security 2100 Act to prevent drastic cuts.

I'll keep working for our seniors.

🚨 Breaking News 🚨 Childhood poverty spiked to 12.4% in 2022 after Republicans blocked the extension of the expanded #ChildTaxCredit.

The expanded CTC was a lifeline during the pandemic, lifting 5M+ from poverty.

We must prioritize kids over partisanship & reinstate this aid.

The Northeast Career and Tech Academy is the first place in North Las Vegas to provide students with opportunities to learn about cutting-edge technologies.

I’m excited to celebrate this great new resource for our youth.

Today, 22 years since 9/11, we pause to remember those lost, their families, & the brave souls who emerged as heroes.

Team Horsford joined the ceremony in North Las Vegas to honor their memory & #NeverForget.

Let's work together toward a world of peace and understanding.

I’m dedicated to elevating the quality of life for Nevada’s seniors.

That’s why I’ve championed provisions limiting annual out-of-pocket Rx costs for Medicare beneficiaries to $2k and setting insulin prices at just $35/month.

Nevadans can already feel the effects of climate change.

That’s why I’ve worked to invest in renewable energy and work for a more sustainable future for all Nevadans.

September is #NationalCholesterolEducationMonth

Let’s take this opportunity to check our levels, understand the risks, and make heart-healthy choices.

Together, we can build a healthier future for the Silver State.

I'm honored to receive the "Legislator of the Year" Award from @Everytown & local @MomsDemand leaders.

My #BreakTheCycleOfViolenceAct will invest $6.5B in community violence intervention.

I'm grateful for the recognition of our efforts in Nevada & nationally to combat violence.

#TeamHorsford participated in the LVBNM Expo to connect with our local small business owners & share info about how we can help constituents of #NV04.

The LVBNM Expo offers a unique blend of innovation & networking within our community.

Congrats to all of the award recipients!

I had a great time attending the 2023 Battle of the Badges basketball game to show my support for our first responders as they engaged in a friendly match.

Congratulations to the police officers for securing the victory!

I visited Mt. Charleston with @rossjmiller & other local officials to assess the damage from the recent storms.

I'm grateful there were no severe injuries, but there's urgent work ahead.

I'm advocating for an emergency declaration to ensure timely repairs and relief.

I was proud to welcome the National Black McDonald's Operators Association to Las Vegas for their conference.

Together, with the support of @TheBlackCaucus, we'll continue to uplift &  advocate for Black entrepreneurs through creating economic opportunities and wealth building.

Thanks to the #RespectForMarriageAct, we've moved closer to ensuring equality and fairness for all by protecting same-sex and interracial marriages.

Love is love!

September is #ChildhoodCancerAwarenessMonth.

In Nevada and across the nation, we stand in solidarity with every child fighting cancer and the families supporting them.

Let's work to advance research and ensure every child have the resources they need.

Thanks to the #InvestingInAmerica agenda, we're witnessing a surge in construction spending!

I'm happy to see companies prioritizing our infrastructure and investing in clean energy & semiconductor manufacturing.

Nevada is ready for this new era of growth & innovation.

Women should be able to make their own choices about their health.

I will always stand up for #ReproductiveFreedom.

#DefendWomensRights

Today, I attended the ribbon-cutting for @CSNCoyote's Blackstone LaunchPad Entrepreneurship Center, where I discussed a @USMBDA program to bolster underserved Nevadan small business entrepreneurs.

I'll continue working to foster an inclusive economy that benefits all in #NV04.

We've continued to see needless violence in communities across the country.

That's why I've increased investments in evidence-backed, community violence intervention programs like in my  #BreakTheCycleOfViolenceAct.

Happy #LaborDay!

I got my start in public service running the largest job training program in Nevada and saw firsthand the contributions of workers in Nevada and across the country.

While we celebrate, let's also advocate for a future with fair wages and strong workers' rights.

The @FCC is continuing the Affordable Connectivity Program to save 16M American families $500M monthly, thanks to the bipartisan #InfrastructureInvestmentAndJobsAct.

We're continuing work to ensure that everyone in Nevada and across the country can afford access to the internet.

September marks #SuicidePreventionAwarenessMonth.

Remember, you are not alone.

Let's commit ourselves to making mental health care accessible and affordable for everyone.

If you or someone you know needs help, call or text 988 anytime.

Did you know that small businesses are 99.2% of all businesses in Nevada?

The #InflationReductionAct is here to support them with tax credits for energy-efficient upgrades & covering some costs for solar power.

Let's empower our local businesses & move towards a greener future!

Empowering Nevadan workers is a priority for me every day.

Real incomes, household net worth, and unionization are on the rise, with pay for low-wage workers growing at its fastest pace in over two decades.

Together, let's build a stronger workforce!

Congratulations to the 50 new Las Vegas Fire and Rescue recruits!

Thank you for dedicating your career to serving your community.

I wish you all the best as you take on your new positions.

I'm disturbed to see attempts to undermine the rule of law in Georgia.

Trying to remove DA Willis because she brought charges against a former president sets a dangerous precedent.

Democracy can't be a pawn in a partisan chess match.

vanityfair.com/news/2023/08/…

Great news for Nevadans! The economy added another 187k jobs in August, which is 31 consecutive months of job growth.

With unemployment remaining at a near-historic low & robust labor force participation, it’s clear the policies I've voted for are driving sustainable growth.

Student loan interest accrual restarts today & payments begin in October.

But you may still be able to reduce your payment through @POTUS' new SAVE  plan offering relief for many. Single borrowers earning <$15/hr may owe nothing.

Learn more: studentaid.gov/announcements…

Today marks International Overdose Awareness Day.

Let's remember the 105k Americans lost to overdose in 2022 by encouraging support, recovery, and sharing lifesaving prevention strategies.

Learn more on how you can make a difference to #EndOverdose: cdc.gov/stopoverdose/index.h…

59 years ago, the Food Stamp Act of 1964 was signed into law, helping put food on the table for countless American families.

I know how important this program is to families across Nevada, and I'm joining with my colleagues to oppose any cuts to SNAP eligibility.

Team Horsford is here in Moapa Valley to listen to constituents and directly share information about the resources we have to help the community.

I'm dedicated to hearing from constituents from across all of #NV04.

The West Side Oasis in the Historic Westside blends preserving cultural heritage with the spirit of modern innovation.

As we celebrate #NationalBlackBusinessMonth, let's honor places like this that contribute to our neighborhoods.

The weight of gun violence shouldn’t bear down on our communities. 

As the top threat to America’s kids, it’s time we take action.

That’s why I’m pushing for commonsense solutions to keep guns out of schools, #BreakTheCycleOfViolence, & prioritize safety.

In recognition of #NationalBlackBusinessMonth, let’s commend Gritz Café.

Serving dishes inspired by the south, they’ve made a significant mark on Nevada’s culinary scene.

We're working to make affordable prescription drugs a reality for millions of people across the country.

Thanks to the #InflationReductionAct, 66,000 seniors here in Nevada will soon save money through Medicare's lower prescription drug price negotiations.

No one should be forced to choose between life-saving medicine & putting food on the table.

Today, the first 10 Rx drugs were selected for Medicare price negotiations.

Thanks to provisions that I voted for, we will lower costs for seniors here in Nevada & across the country.

I was proud to vote for the bipartisan #SaferCommunitiesAct to protect our communities by enhancing background checks, criminalizing gun trafficking, & more.

The $13 billion to bolster mental health and community violence prevention will #BreakTheCycleOfViolence and save lives.

I'm continuing to celebrate #NationalBlackBusinessMonth by spotlighting Giddens Memorial Chapel.

It's a sanctuary of empathy & support for those who have lost a loved one.

Thanks to Raymond L. Jr. & Kyle L. Giddens for their compassionate guidance in helping families.

For #NationalBlackBusinessMonth, I'd like to spotlight Phat Snackz.

This family-owned restaurant in Nevada showcases a dedication to culinary excellence, with each dish reflecting meticulous craftsmanship and passion.

August is #NationalImmunizationMonth, a reminder of the power of vaccines in safeguarding our health.

I urge all Silver State residents to stay updated on their shots.

Together, we can protect our communities and keep Nevada healthy!

60 years ago, thousands marched on Washington for justice, equality, and the dream of a united nation.

I'm forever grateful to those brave souls who paved the way. 

Their legacy reminds us that the fight continues and together, we rise.
Attacks on the free press are also attacks on our democracy.

Florida State Rep. @AngieNixon speaks for all of us. DeSantis’ anti-wokeism is exhausting.

#BlackAmerica #BanOnBlack

#TeamHorsford is excited for the opening of the Debra March Center of Excellence training facility!

Kudos to the College of Southern Nevada & the @cityofhenderson for preparing our students for jobs with this $12M modern facility, in part possible thanks to funds I voted for.

The @StateDept advises travelers to check expiration dates and ensure they meet destination requirements.

Renew at least 6 months before expiry and consider 10-13 week processing times, plus shipping.

Stay informed at travel.state.gov/passport

Thank you to everyone who attended the Shepherd's Breakfast!

#TeamHorsford was happy to attend, hear your thoughts, and share updates about our work to deliver for Nevadans.

I'm highlighting Darla's Southern Cajun Bistro during #NationalBlackBusinessMonth.

Located in the Historic Westside, this establishment offers a culinary experience inspired by the South's rich traditions.

It's a testament to the heritage of southern cuisine.

I stand with Nevadans and people from across the country in affirming the right to essential healthcare on #ReproductiveFreedomDayOfAction.

People, not politicians, should make their own healthcare decisions.

Today marks the 103rd anniversary of the 19th Amendment, which ensures women's right to vote.

On #WomensEqualityDay, I honor the relentless women who fought for this pivotal moment in our nation's history.

Good morning from DC! My CBC colleagues and I are ready to commemorate the 60th Anniversary of the March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom. Many of the same challenges continue, and new ones have surfaced, but we will not go back.

Congratulations again to our very own @LVAces on their @WNBA championship win! 

Today they make history as the first professional team from Nevada to take their victory to the White House. 

#ALLINLV #LVAces #RaiseTheStakes

I'm thrilled to announce a $10,000 grant awarded to the Walker River Paiute Tribe library for cultural classes and literacy workshops.

This initiative will ensure that their heritage continues to be shared with a new generation of students.

PAHRUMP VETERANS: The VA Clinic has issues with its A/C system. I've been assured they're working with the building's owner to resolve them.

In the meantime, services have been made virtual or rescheduled.

I'll keep working to get more resources for veterans in our rural areas.

I know that people should have the freedom to make their own health care decisions.

Abortion and birth control are essential health care.

I know how important affordable housing is for Nevada families and will keep working until every Nevadan has a fair shot to buy a home.

My #HOMEAct will ensure the housing market works for everyday Nevadans and families across the country.

I’ll keep working hard for Nevadans and promote fair competition to lower costs & empower our small businesses.

Our local entrepreneurs should have the resources they need to thrive.

Thanks to policies I’ve voted for, we’re investing in more apprenticeship programs to empower workers to master new skills & trades.

This not only strengthens our workforce but supercharges middle-class growth here in Nevada & the rest of the country.

I’m thrilled to see that job satisfaction hit an all-time high last year.

That’s what happens when we pass policies to create better-paying jobs and create opportunities for workers to thrive.

Please join me to honor the seniors in Nevada & across the country on #NationalSeniorCitizensDay.

Their wisdom, experience, & resilience have paved the way for future generations.

I’ll continue working to lower costs for our seniors & ensure they have the resources they need.

Let’s amplify the Gas Station Studios for #NationalBlackBusinessMonth!

It’s a local haven for artists from across our communities, seasoned and new, and whose sound engineers help create some of the unique sounds of Las Vegas.

August is Children’s Eye Health and Safety Month!

Early eye exams can detect issues that impact learning & daily life.

Ensuring clear vision is key to setting our kids on a path to success.

During #NationalBlackBusinessMonth, let’s shine a spotlight on the Classic Jewel in Downtown Las Vegas.

It’s a cornerstone of the Black community and a gathering place of celebration and connection.

We’ve seen big strides in lowering healthcare & Rx drug costs in Nevada & across the country!

Thanks to provisions I’ve voted for, over 3.4 million seniors are saving on their healthcare costs and Medicare recipients are seeing lower Rx drug costs.

#TeamHorsford is on the ground in Beatty, Goldfield, Tonopah, Hawthorne, Gabbs, & the Walker River Paiute Tribe!

Thanks to all who have engaged with us!

We’re dedicated to hearing everyone’s voice within #NV04.

Today marks the anniversary of the 19th Amendment's ratification in 1920. 

Let's celebrate the women who fought for the right to vote and forever changed the course of our nation. 

Their spirit and determination inspire us to keep pushing for equality and justice for all.

🚨 Urgent warning for Las Vegas & Pahrump 🚨

@NWSVegas has issued a severe flash flood warning for our area.

Avoid flooded areas, & remember "turn around, don’t drown" when faced with flooded roads. Don’t underestimate the power of water when driving.

lasvegassun.com/news/2023/au…

I'm spotlighting Sumnu Marketing during #NationalBlackBusinessMonth, led by a local entrepreneur.

Through the 'Twelve Steps of Marketing' philosophy, they've empowered countless small businesses to elevate their brand presence.

Everyday Nevadans in #NV04 are seeing real benefits from initiatives that I voted for.

We're making healthcare more affordable, capping insulin costs at $25/month, reducing premiums, & also expanding affordable high-speed internet to 49K households.

Six years ago, the #ForeverGIBill was signed into law, reinforcing our commitment to the brave men & women who've served our nation. 

I remain dedicated to supporting our veterans here in Nevada and across the country.

I'm thrilled to see the gap between Black unemployment and overall rates narrow to an unprecedented low.

I'll keep working to keep the record-low unemployment rates for Black and Hispanic workers, as well as those with disabilities.

The cost-lowering provisions of the #InflationReductionAct are popular, such as:
🏥 Lowering family health insurance costs by $2,400/year
⚡ Reducing energy costs by $1,000/year
💉 $35/month cap for insulin

1 year since the #InflationReductionAct, & the results speak for themselves:
✅ Capped insulin costs
✅ Lower Rx drug costs thanks to Medicare negotiating w/ Big Pharma
✅ Lowest inflation in the last two years

I’ll continue to champion policies that prioritize Nevada families.

I've been working to build our economy from the bottom up and the middle out.

Since 2021, just in #NV04:
✅ 57,300 jobs created
✅ 1,050 new clean energy jobs
✅ 34,500 small businesses launched

Good news for Salvadorans in Nevada! @DHSgov has extended Temporary Protected Status (TPS) for El Salvador through March 9, 2025.

If you're a current TPS beneficiary, make sure to re-register by Sept. 10 this year so you can keep your immigration status.

tinyurl.com/3en8vv72

Everyone deserves to be celebrated and protected, regardless of who they love or how they identify.

I'm proud to have joined fellow Nevadans to #ProtectSafeSpaces and announce the reintroduction of the Equality Act earlier this year.

The Biden-Harris Administration is offering paid internships at The White House Office, Office of the VP, and many other important offices.

This is a great chance for people from all backgrounds to serve our country.

Check your eligibility & apply at whitehouse.gov/get-involved/…

Today marks the 88th anniversary of the Social Security Act.

I join my colleagues in our commitment to shield it from those who seek to end it.

A lifeline for over 65 million Americans, this program has been crucial in lifting countless seniors out of poverty.

From supporting 3,400 farms with climate-smart practices to connecting 40k homes & businesses to clean energy, we’ve delivered energy resilience and affordability.

Our rural communities are an essential part in our work to combat the #ClimateCrisis.

The #InflationReductionAct is a breath of fresh air for Nevadans & all Americans.

From environmental justice grants to funding for local green initiatives like the Nevada Clean Energy Fund, it will reduce pollution significantly and help us meet our climate goals.

Recently I toured Candi’s Beauty Supply & presented the dedicated owner with a Certificate of Special Congressional Recognition.

Celebrating people like Yolanda is what #NationalBlackBusinessMonth is all about. 

Proud to have a vibrant small business community here in Nevada!

As we recognize the 1st anniversary of the #InflationReductionAct, I’m happy to see its effects for Nevadans & all Americans.

Through actions like capping insulin costs for seniors & empowering Medicare to negotiate lower drug prices, we are taking real steps to lower costs.

Thank you to all the leaders of the Jewish community here in Nevada who took the time to meet with me.

I was happy to discuss your ongoing initiatives and future projects, and I will continue to support you and your efforts in any way I can.

Congratulations to the Vegas Valley Police Academy first graduating class of 2023!

Thank you for choosing to serve our communities.

I'm proud to be an original co-sponsor of the resolution to commemorate the 50th Anniversary of Hip-Hop.

Hip-Hop has continued to shape American culture, arts, & industry for decades.

Let's celebrate the profound impact & diversity of voices that it's brought to our nation.

Exciting news for #NV04!

I'm happy to announce funding for three projects that will help support Nevada’s youth & prevent & reduce crime:

✅ Gentlemen By Choice: $250k
✅ Clark County Public Defender Counseling: $175k
✅ North Las Vegas Police Officer Wellness Program: $145k

Yesterday, I met with some of the DWSS workers on the frontlines of helping make sure Nevadans don't go hungry through food assistance programs like SNAP and have access to medical and childcare services.

Thank you for all the work you do to help Nevadans.

A year since the #PACTAct, over 300,000 toxic-exposed veterans now benefit from expanded VA care. But more can still apply for the support they deserve.

There's no deadline to apply for benefits at VA.gov/PACT, but backdated benefits are available through 8/14.

ATTENTION VETERANS: The deadline to apply for PACT Act benefits backdated to 8/10/22 has been EXTENDED to Monday, 8/14 at 11:59 pm.

Take advantage of this extension to file or submit your intent to file at VA.gov/PACT

Deeply saddened to see the damage from the wildfires across Maui.

While it may not be in my district, many of my constituents have strong ties to Hawaii.

My heart goes out to all those affected.

It's important we stand in solidarity with the LGBTQ+ community and ensure we #ProtectSafeSpaces.

I was honored to join members of our communities earlier this year to announce the reintroduction of the Equality Act.

Passport demand is at an all-time high: routine processing can take 10-13 weeks & expedited service 7-9 weeks.

Always check your passport’s expiration date before making travel plans.

And remember, many countries require it to be valid for 6 months after your planned departure.

I’m proud to have voted for the CHIPS and Science Act, investing $52+ billion to boost US manufacturing and repatriate critical supply chains. 

This law ensures our nation will continue to lead the world in science and technology, bringing critical jobs right here to Nevada.

Captain Kane and Captain Odocha joined me to discuss diversity and enrollment at West Point.

Thank you both for your service and dedication to making our military accessible to those who wish to serve.

Manufacturing is a key part of Nevada’s economy, employing more than 60k workers.

Thanks to provisions I voted for, we’ll bolster our local economy, strengthen supply chains, and become a leader in clean energy technologies.

Let’s build the future right here in Nevada.

Yesterday I hosted @WestPoint_USMA to share information about scholarships for historically underserved students with excellent academic records to explore their potential future at West Point.

Learn more at horsford.house.gov/West-Poin…

Today, on #PurpleHeartDay, we honor the sacrifice of our military heroes who have given so much for our nation. 

Thank you to all the Purple Heart recipients in Nevada & across the country for your service.

It's been 58 years since President Johnson signed the Voting Rights Act.

58 years later, we're witnessing an erosion of this hard-earned right.

As we reflect on the past, we must also be relentless in securing our right to vote, now and always.

thegrio.com/2023/08/06/58-ye…

As summer comes to a close, I'm wishing all students, teachers, and parents in #NV04 a successful #BackToSchoolMonth!

I'll keep working for equal educational opportunities for all, no matter the zip code.

Have a great start to the new school year!
